code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import'./App.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[posts,setPosts]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchPosts=async()=>{try{const response=await fetch('http://localhost:8000/posts/');if(!response.ok){throw new Error('Failed to fetch posts');}const postsData=await response.json();setPosts(postsData);}catch(err){setError(err.message);}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchPosts();},[]);if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"app-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Instagram Clone"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"loading",children:"Loading posts..."})]});}if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"app-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Instagram Clone"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"error",children:["Error: ",error]})]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"app",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"app-header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Instagram Clone"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("main",{className:"feed",children:posts.length===0?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"no-posts",children:"No posts available"}):posts.map(post=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"post-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"post-image",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:post.image_url,alt:"Post"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"post-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"post-caption",children:post.caption}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"post-meta",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"post-date",children:new Date(post.created_at).toLocaleDateString()})})]})]},post.id))})]});}export default App;
